title: How to Be on Advanced Server on Mobile Legends: Bang Bang

steps.title: Check the requirements first.
steps.content: Check the requirements first. To join Advanced Server, you will need to live in Southeast Asia, have an MLBB account of Level 15 or higher, and have a stable internet connection for matchups.

steps.title: Bind your Original Server account.
steps.content: Bind your Original Server account. If you do not bind your account, you could lose your progress, so it's advisable to bind your account on Facebook , VK , TikTok, WhatsApp , X , or Moonton.

steps.title: Note this.
steps.content: Note this. Advanced Server has a quota of users, and although the quota opens access from time to time, it's not uncommon to get a notice that you may be unable to enter. You can keep trying to join in, but your luck may hit you when you reach the server!

steps.title: Join the server.
steps.content: Join the server. To join the server, you will have to go to Customer Service (person with a headset). Then, click on "How to get access to the Advanced Server." You will then be given a link to download via "TapTap."

steps.title: Download the Advanced Server app via TapTap.
steps.content: Download the Advanced Server app via TapTap. You can do this by downloading TapTap on your mobile device and creating an account if this is a new app. You will then be redirected to the download page. Once you are done downloading, you can load the Mobile Legends Advanced Server app. Note that the experience will be like starting from scratch, so you will not automatically unlock all heroes/emblems/talents.
